#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

ll xd[55][55];

ll go ( int x, int y ) {
    if ( !x || !y ) return 1;
    if ( xd[x][y] ) return xd[x][y];
    return xd[x][y] = go(x - 1, y) + go(x, y - 1);
}

int main ( ) {
    int x, y;
    while ( cin >> x >> y ) {
        memset(xd, sizeof xd, 0);

        cout << go(x, y) << '\n';
    }
}
